cloud.title: GoodCloud
cloud.tips: With GoodCloud, you can manage groups of routers, check their status in real-time, set up routers remotely, operate routers in batch and monitor connected clients etc.
cloud.add_id_tips: Please use this ID to bind the device to your cloud account.
cloud.unbind_tips: Are you sure you want to unbind the device from GoodCloud? The device is bound to:
cloud.unbind_note: Note: This will only take effect in the selected region. If you bound this device on different regions, do this on each region.
cloud.unbound_tips: The device is not bound to any cloud account.
cloud.token_invalid_tips: Device security key verification failed, please $$$$Rebind the Device$$$$ to connect {cloud}.
cloud.service_desc: With {service}, you can manage groups of routers, check their status in real-time, set up routers remotely, operate routers in batch, monitor connected clients, etc.
cloud.bind_ready_tips: The device is bound by {user} on {time}
cloud.enabled_tips: The Cloud Service is currently Enabled.
cloud.device_be_bound_info_title: The following is this device information.
cloud.device_be_bound_by_other_tips: This device is already bound by {user} . You cannot bind it to your account.
cloud.contact_other_user_tips: You need to contact the {user} and ask them to unbind the device for you. Alternatively, use platform messaging to initiate an unbind request to that account.
cloud.not_support_change_bind_tips: Sorry, this device does not support the feature to change the bound account. Please contact your device provider for further assistance.
cloud.service_disable_tips: The Cloud Service is currently disabled.
cloud.bind_fail_strong_tips: Current device information is as follows. This information may be required by Technical Support if you need assistance.
cloud.email_auth_tips: Please enter the verification code received by your secure email ({email}).
cloud.app_auth_tips: Please enter the one-time password generated by your two-factor authenticator app.
cloud.sms_auth_tips: Please enter the verification code received by your secure phone {phone}.
cloud.unbind_cloud_dpi_tips: Unbinding GoodCloud will invalidate your subscription and disable the DPI feature.

cloud_err.server_busy_msg: The server is busy, please try again later.
cloud_err.account_incorrect_msg: The user name or password is incorrect.
cloud_err.email_verify_code_invalid_msg: The email verification code has expired.
cloud_err.email_verify_code_err_msg: The email verification code is incorrect.
cloud_err.phone_verify_code_invalid_msg: The phone verification code has expired.
cloud_err.send_verify_code_err_msg: Failed to send the email verification code.
cloud_err.phone_verify_code_err_msg: The phone verification code is incorrect.
cloud_err.verify_code_over_limit_msg: Frequent operation, please try again later.
cloud_err.send_msg_over_limit_msg: Can only be sent once a week.
cloud_err.frequent_operation_msg: Frequent operation, please try again later.
cloud_err.verify_code_err_over_limit_msg: Verification Code Error Count Exceeds Limit.
